nodes.text: Star Wars - Special Fan Edition, also known as Star Wars – Die komplette Hörspielbox, was a 13-CD audio drama box set released in 2008 that collected WortArt's six single-disc adaptations of the original and prequel trilogies along with the 3-CD adaptation of Labyrinth of Evil and the 4-CD adaptation of Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader.
